div.p: ANTONIO: Researchers from around the world have published over 200 scientific studies that can help us determine how many standard drinks would be low risk.
ANTONIO: Now there's no way we could go over all of them— and I have a hunch you wouldn't want us to—so we're going to make this simple.
ANTONIO: In this lesson we'll summarize all the research. You'll learn the quantities and frequencies of drinking that create risk for both health problems and impairment problems.
ANTONIO: We've talked about health problem, but impairment problems will be covered later in the program.
ANTONIO: So for now, think of impairment problems as any problem that can happen as a result of just one time drinking or using drugs.
